WorkItem.Description:
A PHP Error was encountered
Severity: Compile Error
Message: 'break' not in the 'loop' or 'switch' context
Filename: Calculation/Functions.php
Line Number: 581


Because it's not a switch-case statement (but previously was), break at line 581 not needed.
WorkItem.Summary: Bug report. Unexpected break statement at Functions.php

Comments.Message: This was fixed many months ago on the official source repository on github
Then why don't you update download lik on https://phpexcel.codeplex.com/?

Because codeplex is restrictive in what it allows.... we have tried to remove it, and it errors, and codeplex won't remove it for us!

PHPExcel has been on github for nearly 5 years now, and we can't blast this site into oblivion, and no visitors here ever seem to look at the "news" on the front page of the site where we keep posting reminders that we're on github instead, and that this site should be considered dead
